job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are part of Financial Services Department working for top-tier Banks, Asset Managers and FinTech companies. Our Banking and Capital Markets practice team focuses on working on providing solutions utilizing Temenos Payments Hub (TPH) system capabilities. We are currently looking for Temenos Consultant to join our team.

   YOUR TASKS

     * Environment Configuration and Set-Up:
          + Define and configure development, test, and production environments based on project requirements.
          + Collaborate with development teams to ensure the environment aligns with application needs.
     * Infrastructure Management:
          + Set up servers, databases, networks, and other infrastructure components.
          + Monitor and maintain the health of these systems to ensure optimal performance.
     * Deployment and Release Management:
          + Coordinate deployment activities, including code releases and updates.
          + Ensure smooth transitions between different environments (e.g., from development to testing).
     * Automation and Scripting:
          + Use tools like Ansible, Puppet, or Terraform to automate environment provisioning and configuration.
          + Write scripts to streamline repetitive tasks.
     * Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution:
          + Investigate environment-related issues (e.g., performance bottlenecks, connectivity problems).
          + Collaborate with development and operations teams to resolve issues promptly.

   This role offers a great opportunity for professional growth and development, working with the latest Temenos Payments Release and Technology stack, to build a robust and scalable solution. You will be working on a fast-paced environment with a collaborative, multicultural and inclusive work culture.
job_details.full_text:
Environment Engineer

We are part of Financial Services Department working for top-tier Banks, Asset Managers and FinTech companies. Our Banking and Capital Markets practice team focuses on working on providing solutions utilizing Temenos Payments Hub (TPH) system capabilities. We are currently looking for Temenos Consultant to join our team.

   YOUR TASKS

     * Environment Configuration and Set-Up:
          + Define and configure development, test, and production environments based on project requirements.
          + Collaborate with development teams to ensure the environment aligns with application needs.
     * Infrastructure Management:
          + Set up servers, databases, networks, and other infrastructure components.
          + Monitor and maintain the health of these systems to ensure optimal performance.
     * Deployment and Release Management:
          + Coordinate deployment activities, including code releases and updates.
          + Ensure smooth transitions between different environments (e.g., from development to testing).
     * Automation and Scripting:
          + Use tools like Ansible, Puppet, or Terraform to automate environment provisioning and configuration.
          + Write scripts to streamline repetitive tasks.
     * Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution:
          + Investigate environment-related issues (e.g., performance bottlenecks, connectivity problems).
          + Collaborate with development and operations teams to resolve issues promptly.

   This role offers a great opportunity for professional growth and development, working with the latest Temenos Payments Release and Technology stack, to build a robust and scalable solution. You will be working on a fast-paced environment with a collaborative, multicultural and inclusive work culture.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on environment configuration, infrastructure management, and deployment for a financial services system (Temenos Payments Hub). It does not involve AI, machine learning, or generative models, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profiles.

phrases: Environment Configuration and Set-Up
Define and configure development, test, and production environments based on project requirements.
Infrastructure Management
Set up servers, databases, networks, and other infrastructure components.
Monitor and maintain the health of these systems to ensure optimal performance.
Deployment and Release Management
Coordinate deployment activities, including code releases and updates.
Ensure smooth transitions between different environments (e.g., from development to testing).
Automation and Scripting
Use tools like Ansible, Puppet, or Terraform to automate environment provisioning and configuration.
Write scripts to streamline repetitive tasks.
Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution
Investigate environment-related issues (e.g., performance bottlenecks, connectivity problems).
Collaborate with development and operations teams to resolve issues promptly.
job_tasks.justification: The tasks described involve setting up, managing, deploying, and troubleshooting technical environments and infrastructure, which aligns with the principles of Operations Engineering, particularly in a DevOps or MLOps context, though not specifically AI-focused.

phrases: Collaborate with development teams
Collaborate with development and operations teams
soft_skills.justification: The job description explicitly mentions collaboration with different teams to ensure alignment and resolve issues.

phrases: working with the latest Temenos Payments Release and Technology stack
professional growth and development
soft_skills.justification: The role emphasizes working with new technologies and offers opportunities for growth, implying a need for continuous learning and adaptation.

phrases: Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution
Investigate environment-related issues (e.g., performance bottlenecks, connectivity problems).
resolve issues promptly.
soft_skills.justification: A significant portion of the tasks involves identifying and resolving technical issues within the environment.

phrases: build a robust and scalable solution.
soft_skills.justification: The goal of building a robust and scalable solution implies a need for initiative and responsibility for the outcome.
